text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.title: Faster Minecarts
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.a: Enable automatic slowdown to prevent derailing at corners.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Enable manual slowdown on soul sand blocks or slime blocks.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.s: Enable automatic slowdown for hopper and chest minecarts on hopper entities.
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.m: Change the maximum speed of acceleration rail.
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 24 (in meters per second).
text.autoconfig.fasterminecarts.option.c: Change the maximum speed of custom speed rail 1.
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 10 (in meters per second).
Change the maximum speed of custom speed rail 2.
Vanilla value is 8, default value is 15 (in meters per second).
